{{aside( page="plugins index")}}


Creates a link to the given media on a particular page.

For example, if there were a page called "welcome.mp3", then to link to the mp3 file :
{{{
{{media( page="welcome.mp3" )}}
}}}

Note. If you use a normal wiki link instead of using this plugin,
then you will link to the wiki page, not the mp3 file
held by that wiki page.

== Details ==
{{plugin( plugin="media" )}}
